location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nawab Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire, to Emanuel Margoty, Captain of the HC Frigate Bombay

mods.abstract: This letter states that a packet from Europe has arrived on board Aga Mahomed Nebee's boat, which is bound for Bombay. Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident, Bushire, requests that Emanuel Margotty order a volunteer with a sufficient guard of seapoys [sepoys] to be ready to board the boat, in order to take charge of the packet and to protect the boat, which allegedly was attacked and plundered by Graine [Umm al-Qaywayn] Arabs on its passage to Bushire.
